meanings.sent1: The red car is dashier than the blue one.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dashier dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at dancing was even dashier than his outfit.
meanings.sent4: The sunset looked even dashier than a painting.
meanings.sent5: The new shoes made her feel dashier than ever before.

meanings.sent1: The latest fashion trends are getting dashier every season.
meanings.sent2: She always manages to put together the dashiest outfits.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked dashier than usual with that bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night is even dashier than during the day.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity's outfit was so dashy, it became the talk of the town.
